text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hm. Five minutes have passed since<n>our designated
departure time, and yet<n>Yukino Bijin and Gold City are<n>
nowhere to be seen...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
We don't necessarily have to go<n>together. We're all going
to the same<n>place, right? So what's the big deal?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Well, we don't have to gotogether, but since we're a team, Ithink we should!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
The bus ride to the training camp is<n>pretty long, right? So I
prepared lots of<n>stuff for us to talk about! ♪ I can't<n>wait to
chat with you all!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I appreciate your thoughtfulness,<n>Curren Chan. I, too,
believe that in<n>order to make this festival a success,<n>we
will need to work as a team.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Thankfully, we still have some time.<n>Let's wait five more
minutes and<n>then—

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: M-my apol'gies!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ah! Yukino and City, you made it! You<n>okay?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Pant... Wheeze... G-guys, I'm sosorry! I ended up spend'n too muchtime pack'n my stuff...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
No, it's my fault! Yukino's only late<n>because I overslept and
she came all<n>the way to the Ritto dorms to pick me<n>up.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
No, not at all! I was already runn'n<n>late by the time I came
t'pick you up!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but seriously, you were actually<n>getting ready. I just
totally screwed<n>up.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Aaand that's enough of fighting for<n>the blame!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
We've got a bus to catch! We were<n>just saying we've got
plenty of time,<n>so no hard feelings. 'Kay?♪

text_block_list.name: City and Yukino
text_block_list.text: ...Okay.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Ugh... Pretty sure this trip is gonna be<n>what you would call
"an uphill battle."

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Heh, do you think so? Well then, let's<n>be on our way.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
We're heeeeere! Wow, it's so<n>traditional and
Japanese-feeling! How<n>exciting! ♪ Oh, Brian? Can I get a
snap<n>of you in front of the inn?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
You know... You haven't stopped<n>blathering since we got on
the bus.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, yeah, I'm just so excited! ♪<n>But that makes me easy
to get along<n>with, right? I'm just like your bestie<n>Maya!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...You're infuriatingly mistaken.

text_block_list.name: Innkeeper
text_block_list.text:
Ah, you must be the group from<n>Tracen Academy! I bet
you're tired<n>from the long journey. Please come<n>in!
Welcome to our inn!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hello. I'm Symboli Rudolf, the one you<n>spoke to on the
phone the other day.<n>Thank you for your cooperation with<n>
this training camp.

text_block_list.name: Innkeeper
text_block_list.text:
The pleasure is all mine! My<n>grandchild is an Umamusume
too, and<n>we look forward to the Fleetfoot<n>Festival every
year. Please let me<n>know if I can help you with anything!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
We appreciate it. Now then, let us<n>head to our rooms and
unpack our<n>things. When that's finished, we'll<n>have a
briefing.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: It looks like everyone is ready. Then<n>let's begin.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The aim of this training camp is to<n>improve our skills in
preparation for<n>the Fleetfoot Festival. I want each of<n>us to
fully comprehend the roles and<n>responsibilities we were
dealt, so<n>allow me to explain.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Firstly, Narita Brian. You will be<n>performing in the archery
show with<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It is a ritual of unparalleled valor. With<n>a purified bow and
arrow in hand, the<n>archer must leap over rocks and cliffs<n>
on the sacred mountain as they shoot<n>at a number of
targets that represent<n>misfortune.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Or so it was. In modern times, the<n>ritual has been simplified,
and now<n>there is only one target set up in front<n>of the
sacred mountain.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Nevertheless, archery practice will be<n>essential. I believe
you have some<n>experience with it, correct?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I had to go to lessons with my big sis.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Heh. Perhaps because it is tradition,<n>archery is a popular
skill to learn<n>among Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I, too, have received instruction in the<n>past, but we will work
together to<n>further improve our skills at this<n>camp.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
They've set up a temporary training<n>ground for us nearby.
Our equipment<n>has also arrived. Shall we begin<n>practice
this afternoon, Brian?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Ugh... I'm tired of having the Empress<n>yelling in one ear and
my sister<n>blathering on in the other. I get it—this<n>is serious.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Whatever you want me to do, I'll do<n>it. But I won't practice
for a moment<n>longer than I have to. I'm leaving as<n>soon
as I've got the feel for it back.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
All right, that's not a problem. Let's<n>move on to the
ceremonial dance.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Yep, yep! Me, Yukino, and City are<n>gonna devote a dance to
the Three<n>Goddesses, right? ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
We'll thank them for everything and<n>ask them to keep
watching over us...<n>with our super cute dance!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Cute?! I-I'll do my best!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Calm down, Yukino. So the lessons<n>will be in the local
community hall, and<n>our teacher is being sent from the<n>
URA, right?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Yes. The teacher is a member of the<n>URA who is
well-versed in the<n>ceremonial dance. They should be<n>
arriving this afternoon, too.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
I've danced for my concerts before,<n>but I've never done a
ritual dance like<n>this... I'm gonna make sure I get it<n>super
cute and polished! ♪

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Good... Then we're all finished here.<n>Meeting adjourned! I
expect each of<n>you to dedicate yourselves to your<n>
training!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I almost forgot. There's one more<n>important thing I want
you to keep in<n>mind.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
As Umamusume, our physical<n>condition is of utmost
importance.<n>Please take care not to get too<n>overzealous.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: In other words, during yourtraining, be sure to stay ontrack!
